phrases: he does not know anything about the electric bastard
He said he is only ever talked to him on the phone.
If Hazamada actually knew who that guy was,
he would probably have already come to silence him.
Seeing as how Hazamada is alive, that proves he really does not know.
Stand users, for some reason, seem to be unknowingly drawn to one another,
even if they do not know each other.
They say that you are bound to the person that you are going
to marry by the red string of fate, right?
It is sort of like that.
You just end up eventually meeting them.
They might be an enemy, a friend, the guy who steps on your foot on the bus,
or someone who just moved in next door.
I do not know how many Stand users are in this town right now,
but no matter how they try to hide, they will eventually show themselves.
He knows that is going to happen eventually.
He needs to attack us already!
But that also means that he is cautious.
it is probably only when they are certain they are going to win.
Why is he trying to act all cool, drinking tea?
Episode 8 Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
Koichi, was me asking you to come here, um...
No, it is not a bother...
But I was wondering what you needed.
Wow, so Koichi's with a girl...
Let us get a bit closer!
If you wanted to see my notes on some homework,
my grades are not that good, and my handwriting's messy.
If it is money, I can probably manage about 1,000 yen...
Or did you want me to switch weekly duties with you?
That is not what this is about.
If you need someone to take in a kitten or a puppy,
we have already got a dumb dog named Police at home.
I am just going to come out and say it.
I am in love with you, Koichi.
You are the only thing I think about all day, Koichi.
I have been so afraid to express these feelings...
But if I do not, I feel like my chest is going to burst.
I do not mind if you hate me.
I just thought I would be brave and tell you.
Did someone just confess her love to me?!
I cannot believe it, but she did just say that, right?
Even I have never had anyone tell me that!
You do not have to cry about it.
I am sure that you must have a girlfriend, Koichi...
Are you making fun of me?
Koichi, your face has gotten sharper lately.
You look like a man with courage and conviction.
But you are also so cute when you smile.
Yeah, she is definitely got a point.
My face is pretty sharp too, is not it?
I think the best thing about a man is his future.
And Koichi, your future is shining.
Wh-When you speak that highly of me...
I am sure you must hate girls like me that are not cute.
That bastard has all the luck!
Uh, n-no, I do not, but...
It is just, when you ask me that so suddenly
Do you love me or do not you?!
I have already told you so much!
Um... I just got all worked up...
By the way, you will come see me again, right?
I feel like a balloon that is been deflated.
All my jealousy just flew away somewhere.
Let us just pretend we never saw anything.
What is wrong with this cola?!
Th-Th-There is so much... hair in it!
Stand users are drawn to one another...
Um, as you can see, it is my turn to clean the lab.
I said some weird things yesterday.
Would you just forget all that?
I get that way when I think too hard.
People are supposed to be more broad-minded.
It was a little surprising, b-but I did not think anything of it...
Will you still be friends with me?
I was so worried about what I would do if you hated me,
I could not sleep all night.
And to make it up to you...
I was up until this morning knitting this for you, Koichi.
I knew your height and chest size, but I was worried how it would fit your shoulders.
I made you a good luck charm, too...
In hopes that you will find a wonderful love.
I also prepared lunch so we could eat it together...
I bought this shrimp at the fish market this morning.
You cannot find this freshness at a store.
I personally took out all of the bones, one by one, with tweezers.
There is one thing I know now...
Yukako Yamagishi, to be completely honest, is extremely strange!
I have to hurry up and turn her down!
B-But if I eat this, it will be like saying yes...
But if I refuse it, she will probably get mad.
You need to hurry up and throw this garbage away before class starts.
I-I would better go throw it away.
I will hold half of it for you.
I am the class rep, so I am the one who will get yelled at.
I have not the slightest idea what you are talking about.
I know what you are doing.
The stench of a homewrecker is all over you.
If you ever come close to Koichi again,
I will make sure you regret it.
I tried to be classy about this, but...
I could not care less about him!
You have no right to tell me what the hell I can or cannot do!
What the hell is her problem?!
She is not right in the head.
I will tell the whole school!
Looks like Yukako Yamagishi really was a Stand user.
Her Stand has hair that moves.
But it does not seem like she is an enemy, or going to attack Koichi.
By the way, Okuyasu, what are you going to do about her hair?
I cannot fix something after your The Hand takes it away.
I saved her from getting burnt to a crisp.
Sorry, but I am not a beautician.
What am I going to do?
This is my English test from earlier.
I am worrying so much about Yukako, I cannot concentrate on anything else.
To be honest, I was a little happy at first.
I would never had a girl tell me she loved me before.
But I am the one who let it come to this by not being up-front with her.
I am thinking about telling her straight
that I do not like her or anything, so she needs to leave me alone.
That is not a good idea, Koichi.
If you say that, you are only going to add fuel to the flames of Yukako's passion.
Convincing Yukako Yamagishi not to use her Stand of hair for evil will have to wait.
Right now, we have to figure out how to make her not hate you.
No matter how strongly she feels about you,
if she gets an idea in her head that you are a disenchanting, horrible, boring guy,
everything will be happily ever after, right?
So you have just got to act that way on purpose in front of her.
But hearing that from you does not make me feel better.
I wonder what I need to do to make Yukako think I am terrible.
Well, most girls are not into bad hygiene or mama's boys.
I-I do not want her to think I am a mama's boy!
She might get mad at my mom and put her in danger!
Then it is bad hygiene for you!
Yeah, and do not brush your teeth or change your underwear.
How about getting some lice or spiders in your hair?
Having smelly socks is pretty bad.
Yeah, she will totally hate that!
You need a snotty nose and some drool, too.
If you do not want to do that, then you need to become a guy
who seems like he does not have a future.
You need to make her give up on you.
He was talking about it like he was proud of it.
I lent him money, and he never paid me back.
He cheats on his tests and steals girls' underwear.
He is going to bring about his own downfall.
I am going to stop hanging out with him.
I will cut ties with him, too.
Now as long as Koichi confirms he did all of this stuff by tomorrow,
I hope they did a good job with all that stuff.
I hope she actually gives up on me.
She is even showing up in my dreams...
It appears that your friends do not think too highly of you, Koichi.
I will properly discipline you and make you into a fine man.
You have something that other men do not.
You must live up to that potential.
I am going to have to wait for a chance to run.
Th-There is something I want to ask you.
I guess anyone who suddenly saw that would be.
someone shot an arrow through my chest.
No, that might have been a dream.
When I woke up, my wound was healed, and I was able to do that...
D-Do you know anyone else who can do anything like that?
She has not realized that I am a Stand user!
If you do not get proper nourishment,
you cannot become a fine man for me.
I-I just need to play along with her for now.
You are not eating just yet, Koichi.
You got a 16 on your English exam.
Even if a man is more than just his brains, this is just awful.
I have decided to have you study while you eat.
I am going to give you some questions.
You will choose the correct answer from boxes A, B, and C,
and you will eat what is inside your chosen box.
You are going to do this!
While you live in this house, everything we do must be for your betterment!
Prince often sings the lyric funky music.
What does that mean in Japanese?
I-If I disobey, I will be in trouble...
B-But I have no idea what the answer is.
I have a feeling it is A, but B and C also sound right.
Whatever, I will just pick one.
I will peel them for you.
By the way, if you had chosen box A, I would have had you eat this eraser.
Next, you will be able to eat bacon and eggs.
Question: How is contrast ( taisho ) written in Japanese?
Is it taisho A, taisho B, or taisho C?
If I choose the wrong box, she will definitely make me eat what is in there...
Come on, hurry up and answer!
What am I going to do?
Koichi, you just chose your answer by watching the look on my face, did not you?
So the rumors about you being someone
who is sneaky and shoplifts and cheats on his tests is true!
As punishment, I will have you eat both A and B.
A is English vocabulary corn flakes.
B is asparagus wrapped in pages from an English dictionary.
I am going to make sure you learn while you eat!
I will feed it to you.
You expect me to put up with this?!
Th-There is moving hair mixed in!
I had planted a few hundred strands of my hair in your scalp.
you may come to hate me.
But once you leave this house,
you will see a much better man in the mirror,
and I know you will thank me.
You will realize that you need a woman like me in your life.
You will not be able to live without Yukako Yamagishi.
And just so you know, until you finish eating plates A and B,
you will not be getting the next dish.
This is some company president's holiday villa.
No one will come here until summer.
it does not matter if anyone comes...
